name: Black Tumblr - DistortedOutsider
description: Changed color scheme of the dashboard to black and white with a blue notification bubble. The tumblr radar is now hidden.

user.name: DistortedOutsider
user.about: At the moment I only make themes for sites I use often or when requested by a friend. In the future I plan to take more requests but I don't have the time and I'm not as familiar with the code as I'd like to be. I will use code from another theme if it's something I couldn't find by myself or if there are elements in it I'd like for my theme. I will always reference and link any themes I have used code from. If there's something I've missed or you think I could improve feel free to message me on here or my tumblr. If you like my themes enough to donate you can do so. I'm trying to get a new computer and need to pay for University so any extra income is appreciated.

additional_info: I haven't found a problem that bothers me much or makes it unusable so there may not be an update unless someone asks for a change or I decide to try perfecting it. If you have any questions or feedback I'd suggest sending me an ask on my tumblr because I don't often check my userstyles account.
